<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76343</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4124b118-3300-4149-2167-5f80a3fe40a8#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az akkád művészet</string>
            <string language="en">akkadian art</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">akkadian kunst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">art akkadian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arte akkadian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arte akkadian</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">akkadian τέχνη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arte akkadian</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az akkád művészet általános jellemzőinek és legfontosabb alkotásainak bemutatása</string>
            <string language="en">Presentation of the most important works and average characteristics of the akkadian art</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">akkád,  Agade,  Sarrukín,  Narám-Szín,  dombormű,  </string>
            <string language="en">akkadian, Agade, Sarrukin, Naram-Sin, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Darstellung der wichtigsten Arbeiten und der 
durchschnittlichen Eigenschaften der akkadian kunst</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Présentation des travaux les plus importants et 
des caractéristiques moyennes de l'art akkadian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Apresentação dos trabalhos os mais importantes e
das características médias da arte akkadian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Presentazione degli impianti più importanti e 
delle caratteristiche medie di arte akkadian</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρουσίαση των σημαντικότερων εργασιών και των μέσων 
χαρακτηριστικών της akkadian τέχνης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presentación de los trabajos más importantes y 
de las características medias del arte akkadian</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">akkadian, Agade, Sarrukin, Naram-Sünde, Prägung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">akkadian, Agade, Sarrukin, Naram-Péché, foulage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">akkadian, Agade, Sarrukin, Naram-naram-Sin, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">akkadian, Agade, Sarrukin, Naram-naram-Sin, embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">akkadian, Agade, Sarrukin, ναραμ-αμαρτία, 
embossment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">akkadian, Agade, Sarrukin, Naram-Pecado, repujado</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">11-13</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:Kossuth Kiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
